name: Image Captioning Using Vision Encoder Decoder
desc: Image captioning system with Vision Transformers and GPT-2 models, achieving a remarkable 92% enhancement in generation accuracy.

name: Secure E-Voting System
desc: E-voting system that uses face and fingerprint identification to cast votes. Biometric identification techniques using fingerprint scanners and ML algorithms.

name: Car Sales Dashboard using Tableau
desc: A dynamic, interactive Car-Sales Dashboard using Tableau. This will visualize KPIs related to car sales, helps to analyze sales performance over time and make decisions.
